title: It Was a Dark and Stormy Night
description: When time and distance doesn't end desire it just might be because a witch is involved.The love of Shannon's life has been gone for a decade. She has continued to live her life and raise their children. But one dark and stormy night things change. The past returns and secrets are revealed.This is the first in the Wild Witches series of erotic fantasy stories. With erotic content, this story is for the 18+ audience.
author: Lisa Williamson
